wikipedia_page.main:
Joseph Livingstone (18 June 1942 – 2 August 2009) was an English footballer who played as a forward from 1960 to 1967 for Middlesbrough, Carlisle United and Hartlepool United.
A tall and stocky player, he was known for his physical strength.

response: Livingstone's father, Joe Livingstone, also played professional football. His son, Jed, had a trial with Grimsby Town in 2009. He now lives in his native Middlesbrough and buys and sells properties.

*2 August 2009 – Joe Livingstone, 67, former striker who scored 42 goals in 82 appearances for Carlisle United, and also played for Middlesbrough and Hartlepool United.Tribute to Joe Livingstone, lastingtribute.co.uk. Retrieved 18 August 2009.
